author: Simon Difford
description: Looks the part but is one-dimensional with gin-laced cleansing mint and citrus. Perhaps better with the addition of 2.5ml (½ barspoon) sugar and 3 dashes absinthe.
name: Starboard Light
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml Green crème de menthe green

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
